name: Skeever
stunts: Disease Carrier: When successfully biting with Fight, target may contract 'Ataxia' (aspect) if they fail a Fair Will defense
Swarm Tactics: +1 to Fight for each additional skeever in the same zone (max +3)
Scurry Away: +2 to Athletics when fleeing from combat
notes: Skeevers are large, aggressive rats found throughout Skyrim. They typically travel in packs and can spread disease. Individually weak, they become more dangerous in groups. Common in sewers, caves, and abandoned areas.
combat_tactics: Skeevers attack in groups, swarming targets with quick bites. They flee if their numbers are reduced. They prefer to ambush from hiding spots. Not brave fighters individually.
